entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
